channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-43577|2024-08-04T04:03:08.419Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.1.1 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-08-02T00:48:49.418Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-06-04T18:03:26.345Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
